## Our Value Proposition

At Pamia, we provide fast, reliable, and affordable technology repair and support services for individuals and small businesses. From computers and smartphones to software troubleshooting and office tech setups, we ensure your devices run smoothly so you can focus on what matters most.

## Background

We are second-year students at VIU, developing skills 
in data analysis, business intelligence, and statistical computing.

Pamia is a technology repair and solutions company that helps individuals and small businesses keep their devices running smoothly. We fix computers, smartphones, and other devices, provide software troubleshooting, and offer home and office tech setup services. Our goal is to reduce tech stress and maximize productivity for our customers.
